comment: For a compact space, the locally finite covers are precisely the finite covers. Sadly, this property does not properly characterize all compact spaces. (Contributed by Jeff Hankins, 22-Jan-2010.) (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 11-Sep-2015.)
